sub_title: Senior Global Marketing Manager at UBM Live | ms.rhylie@gmail.com
summary:
PERSONAL SUMMARY 

Results driven with proven ability to develop & strengthen international teams to maximise company profitability & efficiency. Strong managerial background with senior level local / international teams. Good strategic appreciation & vision, able to build & implement sophisticated plans supporting business needs. Experienced leading & growing all sectors of a business. Able to establish sustainable & profitable relationships with customers, suppliers & stakeholders across the world. Self driven, self reliant & leads by example with a collaborative approach & exceptional interpersonal skills which engage, motivate & encourage others through change. Highly focused with a consistent track record of successfully delivering to tight time scales & within budget. Proven creative thinker, with a commercial eye & exceptional financial acumen.

Now seeking to use my transferable skills from 8 years of international marketing experience in a new & challenging position.

Attached:

CV's can be a bit one-sided, can't they? 
So, I'd like you to hear how I am perceived by others I work with, ranging from internal & external connections from all areas of the industry I work in, from all over the world.

This was a task conducted along with my HR department for confidentiality so as to receive honest feedback. This project both put me in a vulnerable position yet proved incredibly humbling. If you want a true character reference of me without any bias, please view 'colleague & client referrals' too to compliment the 'CV' of  career history accomplishments...

treasury_media.title: Rhylie Luanweir - Global Brand Manager  CV

profile_positions.description:
Working on $100 million leading global events portfolio.
Deliver high quality projects within time, cost & quality parameters, emphasis on marketing, social & content strategy. .

Duties: 
-	Cultivating the company’s reputation in the market (customers & suppliers)
-	In charge of leading, motivating & developing the marcoms team
-	Managing international teams & resolving any conflicting priorities
-	Reviewing, refining & developing the strategy & direction of the company
-	Building client/ supplier relationships for revenue & profitability growth
-	Keeping control of business expenditure so within agreed budgets 
-	Campaign management – planning and implementation of all aspects of marketing mix for 9 global events per annum
-	Building of strategic partnerships with media and industry associations
-	Negotiating legal contracts with suppliers

Achievements:

-	Achieved 15% annual revenue growth while profit margin from 56% to 59%
-	Increased customer satisfaction rate from 84% to 95%
-	Manage a team of 7 responsible for events in 9 countries, with highest staff retention & least sick days in the business
-	Pitched, created, & implemented successful global rebrand in 9 countries across exhibitions, digital & conference portfolio – Awarded Finalist for Best Marketing Campaign (Exhibition News Awards)
-	Improved global brand consistency- design – messaging – content strategy
-	Hosted ‘How to’ webinars to share best practice across global UBM offices 
-	Successfully identified new lucrative business opportunities to use across wider UBM divisions 
-	Instigated & spearheaded strategic web consolidation of 18 websites into 1 for increased web traffic, increased SEO ranking & global brand visibility of cphi.com website Cost saving 80k per annum 
-	Improved online/ offline user experience via AB/ Multivariate Testing increasing conversions by 76%
-	Spearhead innovative portfolio charity initiatives
profile_positions.title: Senior Global Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description:
- Manage a Global portfolio of events based in China, India, Europe,Japan, South East Asia, Russia, South America and Istanbul
- Manage an international team focused on and off line Marketing
- Segment, track, analyze and optimize social media, email, direct mail and web based campaigns
- Manage portfolio websites for organic SEO
- Create and monitor SEO, Social Media and  content marketing strategy
- Venue Scout for events based in multiple geographical locations
- Designed Global Portfolio re-brand
- Manage relationships with global offices to ensure brand is adhered to and consistent
- Present strategic business developments to internal and external stakeholders
- Create sustainable business goals with middle and upper management
- Increase YOY profitability via online and offline campaigns
- Created and manage the strategic alignment of the conference brand and live events brand
- Regularly attend niche conferences to stay on trend with new developments/ technologies in the Marcomms world
- Produce innovative solutions to remain leaders in the events industry
- Offer ongoing alternatives to enable client ROI and maintain brand image
profile_positions.title: Marketing Manager International Events Portfolio

profile_positions.description:
Senior Brand Executive working on the International Portfolio of Pharmaceutical Events, CPhI, ICSE, InnoPack, P-MEC & BioPh covering every aspect of the Pharma supply chain. Events operate across Europe, India, China, SE Asia, Japan, South America & the latest, yet to début, Russia.

After attaining a Degree in Marketing & winning numerous Awards for multiple Art exhibitions in the UK, Rhylie proceeded to use her Marketing knowhow & creative flair to develop an acute eye for detail & sense of commercialism through branding & design,  generating new revenue streams via the combination of sales & marketing.  During her 6 years of dedicated marketing experience Rhylie has also worked as a marketer within the Finance sector & the Beauty industry, using this business acumen to build her own company with over 200 clients including various loyalty schemes.

Rhylie is an avid Brand Marketer with experience working within Sales, Operations, Awards & Marketing which have all provided a deep understanding of the 4 core elements to making a successful event/ product.
profile_positions.title: Senior Brand Executive International Event Portfolio

profile_positions.description:
Build the pharma brands and synergy of the European show along with their emerging market shows to promote their continual development and growth via:
* Generating web site traffic & growth
* Interpret analytics ensuring effective communication to target market
* Spreading the word via social media
* Targeted/ segmented email/ DM campaigns
* Averts in relevant publications 
* Banners on relevant website
* All marketing collateral for the shows 
* Continual development and strategy
profile_positions.title: Marketing Executive

volunteer_experiences.description:
I the Ambassador for Global Angels. A charity that helps disadvantaged communities around the world in the following areas:

1) Sanitised water - building wells/ water systems into villages
2) Community building - schools/ hospitals/ homes/ feeding programs 
3) Women's Empowerment 
4) Education


To date I have managed projects in Africa and Mumbai and raised over 200,000 Euro's which has helped over 63,000 children in Ecuador and Africa, by enabling them micronutrients into their feeding programs to help combat malnutrition.

Raised 7,000 Euro's for sanitised water projects enabling 700 people to have fresh drinking water for 10 years.

Organised a function in downtown Paris to promote Global Angels awareness, attended by over 500 professionals, where I showcased the video of the Africa project in action.

Currently working on a crowd funding viral campaign and always pitching for new sponsors.

This is an incredibly rewarding position that I enjoy working vigorously on in my free time.
